explains: adj. 世界级的，世界上一流的

sentences.en: The manager has assembled a world-class team.
sentences.cn: 经理已聚集了一个世界一流的班子。

sentences.en: He was determined to become a world-class player.
sentences.cn: 他下决心要成为一名世界级选手。

sentences.en: He has the potential to become a world-class musician.
sentences.cn: 他有潜力成为世界级的音乐家。
